original_title: Shane's World 31: Life and Times of Drunky the Bear
overview: Drunky the Bear was first spotted in 1930 in the mountains of Uganda. He was not seen again until his appearance at a nightclus in Miami. Fact or fiction? We have spent years researching this urban legend and finally have captured never before seen footage of this elusive beast. For the first time you will experience the unknown.
title: Shane's World 31: Life and Times of Drunky the Bear
